name: NRS cVest Mesh Back PFD
description: With comfort and buoyancy taken care of, you can focus on your paddling. The cVest PFD has a high back panel and mesh lower panel for comfort and compatibility with your kayak seat. Purpose-built and featured for long days at sea.Type III PFD with sea level buoyancy of 7.3kg.High-back design accommodates most sea kayak seats.Mesh lower panel provides plenty of airflow.Contoured shoulder straps are padded for comfort.6 adjustment points provide a customized and secure fit.Front zipper for easy on and off.2 front lash points for your strobe, whistle or other accessories.4 pockets hold a VHF radio and other essentials.Reflective trim for night visibility.
